name: Accele Brid [SNES]
description:
Hi all!

Brid it's a destruction game where you can destroy all the map to finish it!

Controls:

- AD to move player
- Space to Jump
- Click to shoot!

Brid had been made on a personal game a week challenge, the purpose of this week was learn how to "destroy" things and this is the result.

It doesn't any sounds because I dind't have time to add them but I really liked the idea and I'll continue in the future!

For more information about new weekly games check my twitter! https://twitter.com/Paco_S
